baseRule.text: 「若比丘尼，乞重衣，齊價直四張[疊*毛]。過者，尼薩耆波逸提。
baseRule.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhunī Nissaggiya Pācittiya 29

fullParallels.text: Garupāvuraṇaṁ pana bhikkhuniyā cetāpentiyā catukkaṁsaparamaṁ cetāpetabbaṁ. Tato ce uttari cetāpeyya, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
fullParallels.label: Paḷī Theravāda Bhikkhunī Nissaggiya pācittiya 11

translations.text: Eine Nonne aber, die einen schweren Umhang im Tausch erhält, darf (nur) einen, der höchstens vier Kaṁsa wert ist, im Tausch erhalten. Wenn sie mehr als dies im Tausch erhält, muß sie es aushändigen und dafür sühnen.
When a bhikkhuni is asking for a heavy cloth, one worth four bronzes at most may be asked for. If she asks for more than that, it is to be forfeited and confessed.
Ketika seorang Bhikkhuni meminta sebuah jubah tebal, itu harus senilai paling mahal empat perunggu (16 Kahāpaṇa) yang dapat ia minta. Jika dia meminta lebih dari itu, itu harus di sita dan di akui.

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼乞重衣。應取價直四大錢者。若受貴價衣。尼薩耆波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhunī Nissaggiya Pācittiya 23

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼。乞重衣。應乞四錢直衣。過是乞。尼薩耆波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Nissaggiya Pācittiya 29

fullParallels.text: 若復苾芻尼持貴價重衣者。泥薩祇波逸底迦。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mūlasarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Nissaggiya Pācittiya 32

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼。過四羯利沙槃市重衣。尼薩耆波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahāsaṅghika Bhikkhunī Nissaggiya Pācittiya 19
